mapper.select: SELECT CLNT_CD, CLNT_NM, CRN, COPRT_NO, CLNT_DIV_CD, REPST_NM, BIZCON_NM, BSTY_NM, BIZ_ZIP, BIZ_ADDR, BIZ_ADDR_DTL, BIZ_TEL_NO, BIZ_FAX_NO, SUB_RMK_URL, BANK_CD, BKAC_NO, BKAC_OWNER, BASIS_CDTLN_AMT, PCHS_PAY_DIV_CD, PCHS_CLMN_DIV_CD, PCHS_PMNT_MTD_CD, PCHS_VAT_CD, SELL_PAY_DIV_CD, SELL_CLMN_DIV_CD, SELL_PMNT_MTD_CD, SELL_VAT_CD, CLNT_RMK, USE_YN, LINK_GRP_YN, LINK_GRP_CLNT_CD, #{userId} AS USER_ID, #{coCd} AS CO_CD, NVL((SELECT SUM(B.PLDG_AMT * PLDG_RCOGN_RATE / 100) FROM TB_BM02D02 B WHERE B.CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH2' AND B.PLDG_DIV_CD = 'PLDG03' ),0) AS COMMON_CREDIT_SECURITY, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 B WHERE B.CLNT_CD = A.LINK_GRP_CLNT_CD ) AS LINK_GRP_CLNT_NM, A.PCHS_CLMN_DAY, A.PCHS_CLMN_RMK, A.SELL_CLMN_DAY, A.SELL_CLMN_RMK FROM TB_BM02M01 A WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}

SELECT * FROM TB_CM08M01 T INNER JOIN TB_CM15M01 G ON G.FILE_LIST = 'Y' AND T.COMON_CD = 'FITR9903' AND G.CO_CD = #{coCd}
WHERE FILE_TRGT_TYP = 'TB_BM02M01' AND FILE_TRGT_KEY = TO_CHAR(#{fileTrgtKey}) AND G.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T.COMON_CD = G.COMON_CD

SELECT BIZDEPT_SN, CLNT_CD, BIZDEPT_NM, BIZDEPT_DIV_CD, MNG_NM, MNG_DEPT_NM, MNG_PST_CD, MNG_TEL_NO, MNG_MOBLPHON_NO, MNG_EMAIL, SALES_CO_CD, SALES_EMP_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = A.SALES_EMP_ID) AS SALES_EMP_NM, USE_YN, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, TO_CHAR(CREAT_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, TO_CHAR(UDT_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM FROM TB_BM02D01 A WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
AND SALES_CO_CD = #{salesCoCd}

SELECT PLDG_SN, CLNT_CD, CO_CD, PLDG_DIV_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PLDG_DIV_CD) AS PLDG_DIV_NM, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PRDT_GRP) AS PRDT_GRP_NM, PRDT_GRP, PLDG_AMT, PLDG_RCOGN_RATE, PLDG_AMT * PLDG_RCOGN_RATE / 100 AS CDTLN_AMT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EXPRTN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPRTN_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SETUP_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SETUP_DT, PLDG_RMK, USE_YN, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = UDT_ID ) AS UDT_NM, UDT_PGM, TO_CHAR(UDT_DTTM ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM, SELPCH_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(SELPCH_CD) AS SELPCH_NM, PLDG_CHG_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PLDG_CHG_CD) AS PLDG_CHG_NM, PTON_NM, GRNTY_INSTT_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(GRNTY_INSTT_CD) AS GRNTY_INSTT_NM FROM TB_BM02D02 WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd} ORDER BY USE_YN DESC, CO_CD, PLDG_DIV_CD

SELECT CLNT_CD , BIZ_SN , BIZ_TITL , BIZ_CNTS , BIZ_RMK , BIZ_QTY , BIZ_AMT , CREAT_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = A.CREAT_ID) AS CREAT_ID_NM , CREAT_PGM , TO_CHAR(CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREAT_DTTM , UDT_ID , UDT_PGM , TO_CHAR(UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UDT_DTTM FROM TB_BM02D03 A WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
AND SALES_CO_CD = #{salesCoCd}

SELECT A.SALES_EMP_ID, CM06.NAME AS SALES_EMP_NM, CM06.DEPT_ID AS SALES_DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT FN_BM02_MNG_ID( #{coCd} , #{clntCd} ) AS SALES_EMP_ID FROM DUAL ) AS A INNER JOIN TB_CM06M01 CM06 ON A.SALES_EMP_ID = CM06.ID

mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BM02M01 SET CLNT_NM = #{clntNm_P}, CRN = #{crn}, CRN_TYP = #{crnTyp}, COPRT_NO = #{coprtNo}, CLNT_DIV_CD = #{clntDivCd}, REPST_NM = #{repstNm}, BIZCON_NM = #{bizconNm}, BSTY_NM = #{bstyNm}, BIZ_ZIP = #{bizZip}, BIZ_ADDR = #{bizAddr}, BIZ_ADDR_DTL = #{bizAddrDtl}, BIZ_TEL_NO = #{bizTelNo}, BIZ_FAX_NO = #{bizFaxNo}, SUB_RMK_URL = #{subRmkUrl}, BANK_CD = #{bankCd}, BKAC_NO = #{bkacNo}, BKAC_OWNER = #{bkacOwner}, BASIS_CDTLN_AMT = #{basisCdtlnAmt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCHS_PAY_DIV_CD = #{pchsPayDivCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCHS_CLMN_DIV_CD = #{pchsClmnDivCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCHS_PMNT_MTD_CD = #{pchsPmntMtdCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCHS_VAT_CD = #{pchsVatCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELL_PAY_DIV_CD = #{sellPayDivCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELL_CLMN_DIV_CD = #{sellClmnDivCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELL_PMNT_MTD_CD = #{sellPmntMtdCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELL_VAT_CD = #{sellVatCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLNT_RMK = #{clntRmk}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE, LINK_GRP_YN = #{linkGrpYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_GRP_CLNT_CD = #{linkGrpClntCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCHS_CLMN_DAY = #{pchsClmnDay}, PCHS_CLMN_RMK = #{pchsClmnRmk}, SELL_CLMN_DAY = #{sellClmnDay}, SELL_CLMN_RMK = #{sellClmnRmk} WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd_P}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BM02D01 ( BIZDEPT_SN, CLNT_CD, BIZDEPT_NM, BIZDEPT_DIV_CD, MNG_NM, MNG_DEPT_NM, MNG_PST_CD, MNG_TEL_NO, MNG_MOBLPHON_NO, MNG_EMAIL, SALES_CO_CD, SALES_EMP_ID, USE_YN, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM ) VALUES ( TB_BM02D01_SQ01.NEXTVAL, #{clntCd_P}, #{bizdeptNm}, #{bizdeptDivCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mngNm}, #{mngDeptNm}, #{mngPstCd}, #{mngTelNo}, #{mngMoblphonNo}, #{mngEmail}, #{salesCoCd}, #{salesEmpId}, #{useYn}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BM02D02 SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BM02D02 ( PLDG_SN, CLNT_CD, CO_CD, PLDG_DIV_CD, PLDG_CHG_CD, PLDG_AMT, PLDG_RCOGN_RATE, EXPRTN_DT, SETUP_DT, PLDG_RMK, USE_YN, GRNTY_INSTT_CD, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM, SELPCH_CD, PRDT_GRP, PTON_NM ) VALUES( TB_BM02D02_SQ01.NEXTVAL, #{clntCd_P}, #{coCd}, #{pldgDivCd}, #{pldgChgCd}, #{pldgAmt}, #{pldgRcognRate}, #{exprtnDt}, #{setupDt}, #{pldgRmk}, #{useYn}, #{grntyInsttCd}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{selpchCd}, #{prdtGrp}, #{ptonNm} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_BM02M01 A WHERE TRIM(REPLACE(CRN,'-', '')) = TRIM(REPLACE(#{crn},'-', '')) AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BM02M01 T WHERE T.CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
SELECT DISTINCT D.MNG_EMAIL -- , D.MNG_NM FROM TB_BM02D01 D WHERE D.CLNT_CD = #{clntCd} AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.MNG_EMAIL IS NOT NULL

SELECT B.CLNT_CD , #{userId} AS SALES_EMP_ID , B.CLNT_NM --수주처 , B.REPST_NM --수주처대표 , B.BIZ_TEL_NO --전화 , B.BIZ_FAX_NO --Fax , B.CRN , NVL2(BD.MNG_NM,BD.MNG_NM ,BE.MNG_NM) AS MNG_NM , NVL2(BD.MNG_NM,BD.MNG_TEL_NO ,BE.MNG_TEL_NO) AS MNG_TEL_NO , NVL2(BD.MNG_NM,BD.MNG_MOBLPHON_NO ,BE.MNG_MOBLPHON_NO) AS MNG_MOBLPHON_NO , NVL2(BD.MNG_NM,BD.MNG_EMAIL ,BE.MNG_EMAIL) AS MNG_EMAIL FROM TB_BM02M01 B LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02D01 BD ON BD.CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD AND BD.SALES_EMP_ID = #{userId} LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02D01 BE ON BE.CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD AND BE.BIZDEPT_SN = ( SELECT MIN(BB.BIZDEPT_SN) FROM TB_BM02D01 BB WHERE BB.CLNT_CD = B.CLNT_CD AND BB.USE_YN = 'Y' ) WHERE 1=1 AND B.CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
